ComicInfo.Title: The Former Things, Part Two: Requiem for a Caretaker
ComicInfo.Summary: Hidden in secret tunnels beneath a rickety old cabin in the mountains of Tennessee is a library housing the entire history of the Spirit of Vengeance. The answer to every question Johnny Blaze has ever had about the Ghost Rider, it's all there... and Danny Ketch has just set it on fire. Plus, Blaze vs. Blackout and the debut of the all-new Caretaker!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 12:12:18. [CVDB138993]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Tan Eng Huat, Tan Eng Huat
ComicInfo.Editor: Daniel Ketchum, Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada
ComicInfo.Characters: Blackout, Caretaker, Ghost Rider (Blaze), Ghost Rider (Ketch), Hellstorm, Noble Kale, Sara, Shoba Mirza, Vengeance, Zadkiel
